snippet.title: Kanso Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Kanso is a hyper relaxing follow the line game. Avoid obstacles while you trace around circular forms and find your moment of Zen.
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1454650/Kanso/

Think of it as the Zen version of Super Hexagon, or a question. What if Super Hexagon was a walking simulator?
Bringing players of every skill level into a meditative state of flow, an immersion into a calming experience.

Inspired by the Zen calligraphy practice of Ensô, where every day you paint an uninhibited ink circle on a blank sheet of paper.
Expressing a physical moment of reflection, focus, and freedom of flow.  

Players navigate through ten worlds and explore over three hundred levels. Each level with a different circular shape to follow and guiding energies to avoid. Following their own distinct movement pattern.  Some follow you, others avoid you, all of them moving in predictable paths that gently draw you into a tranquil gaming experience.

Features
320 levels
Unique meditative gameplay
Around two hours of play time
Well over 1 hour of original music
Visual narrative
‘Instagrammable’ content to share
Designed specifically to manafest relaxation and well being
